Actor and recording artist Miss Benny (@miss_benny) gained the confidence to fully express himself by seeing fellow LGBTQ+ people online. ğŸŒˆğŸ¤  â€œIt's how I became comfortable with my own identity,â€ says the 20-year-old. â€œIt was absolutely crucial for my survival.
